global.balanceErrorMessage: Nemáte dostatok IOTA k dokončeniu tohto prevodu.
global.transferErrorMessage: Chyba pri prevode. Prosím, skúste to znova.
global.transferSentMessage: Vaša transakcia bolo odoslaná do Tangle.
global.messageSentMessage: Vaša správa bolo odoslaná do Tangle.
global.keyReuseError: Nie je možné uskutočniť transakciu na adresu, ktorá už vykonala určitý prevod.
global.invalidResponsePollingExplanation: Node vrátil neplatnú odpoveď počas vzorkovania (poolingu).
global.invalidResponseFetchingAccount: Node - nesprávna odozva pri získavani informácií o účte. Skús zmeniť node.
global.invalidResponseSendingTransfer: Node - nespráva odozva pri zasielaní transakcie.
global.syncInProgressExplanation: Počkajte, prosím, kým sa synchronizácia dokončí.
global.attachToTangleUnavailableExplanation: Pripojenie k Tangle nie je dostpné na vybranom node.
global.pressBackAgain: Stlačte tlačidlo späť pre zatvorenie aplikácie
global.cannotSendToOwnExplanation: Nemôžete previesť čiastku na vlastné adresy.
global.pleaseWaitExplanation: Trinity práve vykonáva inú funkciu. Počkajte chvíľu a skúste to znova.
global.pleaseWaitTransferExplanation: Váš disponibilný zostatok sa momentálne používa v iných prevodoch. Počkajte prosím na jedno potvrdenie než to skúsite znova.

addAdditionalSeed.seedInvalidCharsExplanation: Seed môže obsahovať iba veľké písmená A-Z a číslo 9. Váš seed obsahuje neplatné znaky. Prosím opakujte akciu.
addAdditionalSeed.seedTooShortExplanation: Seed musí mať {{maxLength}} znakov. Váš seed má {{currentLength}} znaků. Prosím skúste znova.
addAdditionalSeed.nameInUseExplanation: Prosím použite jedinečný názov účtu pre Váš seed.
addAdditionalSeed.noNicknameExplanation: Zadajte názov účtu pre Váš seed.
addAdditionalSeed.seedInUseExplanation: Tento seed je už prepojený s Vašou peňaženkou. Použite prosím iný.

changePassword.oopsExplanation: Zdá sa, že došlo k chybe pri aktualizácii hesla. Prosím skúste znova.
changePassword.incorrectPasswordExplanation: Zadané heslo je nesprávne. Skúste to znova.
changePassword.passwordsDoNotMatchExplanation: Heslá sa nezhodujú. Skúste to znova.
changePassword.passwordTooShortExplanation: Vaše heslo musí obsahovať najmenej 12 znakov. Prosím skúste znova.
changePassword.oldPassword: Nie je možné nastaviť staré heslo
changePassword.oldPasswordExplanation: Nie je možné použiť staré heslo ako nové heslo. Prosím skúste znovu s novým heslom.
changePassword.ensureStrongPassword: Uistite sa, že používate silné heslo, minimálne 12 znakov.

copyToClipboard.seedClearedExplanation: Seed bol z bezpečnostných dôvodov vymazaný zo schránky.
copyToClipboard.seedCopiedExplanation: The seed will be cleared once you press "DONE" or 60 seconds have passed.
copyToClipboard.clickToCopy: Click the button below and copy your seed to a password manager.
copyToClipboard.doNotStore: Do not store your seed in plain text.
copyToClipboard.shareSeed: Share your seed to a secure password manager

enterSeed.invalidCharactersExplanation: Seeds can only consist of the capital letters A-Z and the number 9. Your seed has invalid characters. Please try again.
enterSeed.seedTooShortExplanation: Seeds must be {{maxLength}} characters long. Your seed is currently {{currentLength}} characters long. Please try again.
enterSeed.seedExplanation: Seeds should be {{maxLength}} characters long, and should contain capital letters A-Z, or the number 9. You cannot use seeds longer than {{maxLength}} characters.
enterSeed.neverShare: NEVER SHARE YOUR SEED WITH ANYONE

login.emptyPasswordExplanation: You must enter a password to log in. Please try again.
login.selectDifferentNode: Do you want to select a different node?

loading.loadingFirstTime: Loading seed for the first time.
loading.youMayNotice: You may notice your device slowing down.

newSeedSetup.seedNotGeneratedExplanation: Please click the Generate New Seed button.
newSeedSetup.individualLetters: Press individual letters to randomise them.

onboardingComplete.walletReady: The wallet is now set up and ready to use. If you need to make any changes in the future, look in the Settings menu.

paperWallet.clickToPrint: Click the button below to print a paper copy of your seed.
paperWallet.neverShare: Never share your seed with anyone.

receive.addressCopiedExplanation: Your address has been copied to the clipboard.

saveYourSeed.seedClearedExplanation: The seed has been cleared from the clipboard for your security.
saveYourSeed.mustSaveYourSeed: <0><0>You must save your seed with </0><1>at least one</1><2> of the options listed below.</2></0>

seedReentry.incorrectSeedExplanation: The seed you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
seedReentry.thisIsACheck: This is a check to make sure you saved your seed.
seedReentry.ifYouHaveNotSaved: If you have not saved your seed, please go back and do so.

send.invalidAddressExplanation1: Address should be {{maxLength}} characters long and should have a checksum.
send.notEnoughFundsExplanation: You do not have enough IOTA to complete this transfer.
send.keyReuseExplanation: The address you are trying to send to has already been used. Please try another address.
send.invalidAmountExplanation: Please enter a valid transaction amount. It may be helpful to view the IOTA unit explanation at the bottom of this page.

setPassword.passwordTooShortExplanation: Your password must be at least {{minLength}} characters. It is currently {{currentLength}} characters long. Please try again.
setPassword.passwordMismatchExplanation: The passwords you have entered do not match. Please try again.
setPassword.nowWeNeedTo: Now we need to set up a password.
setPassword.anEncryptedCopy: An encrypted copy of your seed will be stored on your device. You will use this password to access your wallet in future.
setPassword.ensure: Ensure you use a strong password of at least 12 characters.

setSeedName.canUseMultipleSeeds: You can use multiple seeds with this wallet. Each seed requires an account name.
setSeedName.youCanAdd: You can add more seeds in the Settings menu.

modeSelection.expertModeExplanation: Expert mode will provide access to additional features like manual promotion and reattachment.
modeSelection.modesExplanation: Only enable Expert mode if you are an experienced Tangle user. You may find it confusing otherwise.

settings.transferSendingExplanation: Please wait until your transfer has been sent.
settings.generatingAddressExplanation: Please wait until your address has been generated.
settings.nicknameChangedExplanation: Your account name has been changed.
settings.accountDeletedExplanation: Your account has been removed from the wallet.
settings.cannotPerformActionExplanation: Go to advanced settings to reset the wallet.
settings.poorConnectionExplanation: Failed to change currency due to a poor connection.
settings.couldNotFetchRatesExplanation: Something went wrong while fetching conversion rates for {{currency}}.
settings.fetchedConversionRatesExplanation: Successfully fetched latest conversion rates for {{currency}}.

resetWalletRequirePassword.enterPassword: Enter your password to reset the wallet.

walletSetup.okay: Okay. Let's set up your wallet!
walletSetup.doYouAlreadyHaveASeed: Do you already have a seed that you would like to use?
walletSetup.seedExplanation: The IOTA seed is like a username and password to your account, combined into one string of 81 characters.
walletSetup.explanation: <0><0>You can use it to access your funds from</0><1> any wallet</1><2>, on</2><3> any device</3><4>. But if you lose your seed, you also lose your IOTA.</4></0>

welcome.thankYou: Thank you for downloading the IOTA wallet.
welcome.weWillSpend: We will spend the next few minutes setting up your wallet.
welcome.reminder: You may be tempted to skip some steps, but we urge you to follow the complete process.

writeSeedDown.yourSeedIs: Your seed is {{maxSeedLength}} characters read from left to right.
writeSeedDown.writeDownYourSeed: <0> Write down your seed and checksum and </0><1>triple check</1><2> that they are correct.</2>

history.bundleHashCopiedExplanation: The bundle hash has been copied to the clipboard.
history.addressCopiedExplanation: The address has been copied to the clipboard.

logoutConfirmationModal.logoutConfirmation: Are you sure you want to log out?

deleteAccount.areYouSure: Are you sure you want to delete the account called {{accountName}}?
deleteAccount.yourSeedWillBeRemoved: Your seed and transaction history will be removed.
deleteAccount.enterPassword: Enter your password to delete this account.

manualSync.pressToSync: Press the button below to sync your account.
manualSync.youMayNotice: You may notice your device slowing down.

useExistingSeed.title: Enter a seed and account name.

viewSeed.enterPassword: Enter password to view your seed.

saveSeedConfirmation.reenter: You will now be asked to re-enter your seed.
saveSeedConfirmation.reenterWarning: If your device fails and you have not saved your seed, you will lose your IOTA.

walletResetConfirmation.warning: <0><0>All of your wallet data including your </0><1>seeds, password,</1><2> and </2><3>other account information</3><4> will be lost.</4></0>

fingerprintSetup.instructionsEnable: Touch your device's fingerprint reader to enable fingerprint authentication.
fingerprintSetup.instructionsDisable: Touch your device's fingerprint reader to disable fingerprint authentication.
fingerprintSetup.fingerprintAuthEnabledExplanation: You have succesfully enabled fingerprint authentication.
fingerprintSetup.fingerprintAuthDisabledExplanation: You have succesfully disabled fingerprint authentication.
fingerprintSetup.fingerprintAuthFailedExplanation: Fingerprint authentication failed. Please try again.
fingerprintSetup.fingerprintUnavailableExplanation: Your device does not support fingerprint recognition or it has not been configured in the device settings.
fingerprintSetup.buttonInstructionsDisable: Press the button below to disable fingerprint authentication.
fingerprintSetup.buttonInstructionsEnable: Press the button below to enable fingerprint authentication.
fingerprintSetup.instructionsLogin: Touch fingerprint reader to log in.

transferConfirmation.youAreAbout: You are about to send {{contents}} to the address

twoFA.wrongCodeExplanation: The code you entered is incorrect.
twoFA.emptyCodeExplanation: Please enter a code and try again.
twoFA.keyCopiedExplanation: Your 2FA key has been copied to the clipboard.
twoFA.addKey: Add this key to your 2FA app
twoFA.twoFAEnabledExplanation: You have successfully enabled Two Factor Authentication.
twoFA.enterCode: Enter the code from your 2FA app

rootDetection.rootDetected: <0>Your device appears to be rooted/jailbroken.</0><1>This can pose a significant risk to the security of your wallet.</1><2>Do you wish to continue despite this risk?</2>
